name: Dark Budget Overview
description: A mobile screen displaying budget information with a dark theme, emphasizing spending overview and individual budget categories.

atoms.name: Dark Card
atoms.description: Rounded card with a subtle shadow on a dark background.

atoms.name: Muted Text
atoms.description: Secondary text color for labels and descriptions.

atoms.name: Rounded Button
atoms.description: Small, rounded button with a light background and dark text.
atoms.css: background-color: #2E2E2E; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 8px; padding: 6px 12px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500;

atoms.name: Spending Arc
atoms.description: Circular arc displaying spending progress with a label and value.
atoms.css: /* Requires custom SVG or canvas implementation */

code.css: .budget-card { background-color: #121212; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; } .budget-card-title { color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; } .budget-card-subtitle { color: #A0A0A0; font-size: 14px; }

avoid_for: Data-dense dashboards requiring high information density
Applications with a playful or colorful aesthetic
